column2: Move Capital to Rio de Janeiro
With the end of malês war, we can move our government from São Paulo to Rio de Janeiro again and start rebuilding the city
Declare independence from Spain and form the nation of Southern Peru
The Viceroyalty of Peru has declared its independence and changed the name of the country to Southern Peru.
The Vicerey of Peru has declared its independence and formed the new nation of Southern Peru. How we will respond?
There is nothing we can do
We will not let another liberal republic arise!
As our nation finally gets its long-desired independence, we must unite with our brothers Charruans..

The Charruan Confederacy has been dismantled by the imperialists brazilians whom, with their superior military power, have conquered the lands of Rio Grande do Sul. The bonds within our two lands is broken, and the people have been separated.
For how late it was, our unification with South Peru shall break the balances of the Americas, and bring power upon our nation, which is one!.
